name: node-bp
description: A simple boilerplate for Node and ES6

scripts.build:node: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rm -rf dist/ && tsc src/main.ts --outDir dist/
scripts.bundle:node: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rm -rf dist/ && parcel build src/main.ts
scripts.bundle:parcel: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rm -rf dist/ && parcel build src/index.html  --public-url ./
scripts.serve:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run bundle:parcel && npm run host:http
